content.rendered:
Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay play the detective role of Elliot Stabler and Olivia Benson in this vibrant crime drama set in New York. As a member of a special unit of detectives, they dig deep into the dark things of the big city. Their commitment to ending controversial and sexual crimes is unwavering.
Seasons: 23 (1999- )
Status: Ongoing
Creator: Dick Wolf
Channel: NBC
Starring: Mariska Hargitay, Christopher Meloni, Ice-T
